data.title: Fix red screen on some Android devices
data.body: I just realized when seeing this thread : http://urho3d.prophpbb.com/post1275.html than I had the same problem with a Sumsung Galaxy S3 but forgot to create a pull request for the fix (found in https://bugzilla.libsdl.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2291)

data.title: Added ability to clone components
data.body:
- Added Node::CloneComponent to clone components existing in other
  nodes.
- Added log warning to Node::AddComponent if the component already has a
  parent node.

data.title: cmake creating project , can't add to main urho3d , also Name of project is Main problem when vc2013 installed also
data.body:
i created new project in windows as described in this link :
http://urho3d.github.io/documentation/a00004.html

few problems :
1 . i also have installed VS 2013 in my pc , so when i load the created new project in vs 2012 express and try to compile im getting this error:

```
error MSB8020: The builds tools for v120 (Platform Toolset = 'v120') cannot be found. To build using the v120 build tools, either click the Project menu or right-click the solution, and then select "Update VC++ Projects...". Install v120 to build using the v120 build tools.    
```

the cause for the problem  and sulotion to solve the problem can be found here :
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19801072/the-builds-tools-for-v120-platform-toolset-v120-cannot-be-found
1. i have the main Urho3D visual studio tree with the source and the example source compiled , and i like to add my new created project to the Main Urho3D Tree but it yeld and error when i try to add the Main.vcxproj ( my project )  to the main Urho3D Tree.
   the error looks like the one i attaching in the picture 
2. the new projects are always named Main even so i Gave the name in the :

```
# Set project name
project (TestProject)

```

![new_projec](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1107316/2826472/739aea96-cf70-11e3-9c18-1bc427cdb732.png)

data.title: Added Catmull-Rom spline type which interpolates through the control nod...
data.body:
...es

I found that it is very difficult to control current the curve with current splinepath class because slightly change of one node changes all curve. So, here is Catmull-Rom spline which interpolates through control nodes and position change of one node changes curve only locally(4 nodes). Note it needs 4 nodes minimum to actually work.
Preview camera flying through this spline.
http://gfycat.com/TediousHeartyEnglishsetter

data.title: [Feature request] Listview scroll on touch devices
data.body:
When we have a scrollview (a listview for example) it is pretty difficult to scroll on an Android or iOS device, because we have to use the tiny scrollbar on the right.

It would be better to be able to scroll naturally by touching the screen and moving fingers up and down like any other app.

reproductible step :
-> Create a node
-> Create a static model
-> Open ressource browser

data.title: Refactor to make MarkNetworkUpdate() as virtual method of Serializable class
data.body:
The MarkNetworkUpdate() will be called by Serializable::OnSetAttribute() method when the attribute being set is a network attribute (has AM_NET bit set).

Additionally, scan through all the attribute registrations to make sure the correct macros are being used consistently.

data.title: question with terrainPatch update
data.body:
I am writing a terrain editor,when i modify the heightmap ,then call 
terrain->SetHeightMap(pHeightMap); ok! 
but this is to slowly,becouse all vertex data is rebuild,then i get the terrainPatch which is modify,then call 
terrain->CreatePatchGeometry(pPatch);
data is update to gpu,but not change in show,why?
thanks!

data.title: Option in BilboardSet to face camera only on one axis
data.body:
It would be great if we could have billboards that rotates to camera only on one axis, relative to parent node to allow rotation of the axis. Currently it is possible to "face camera" so the billboard rotates on all three axis.

With that feature it would be easier to do light shafts by adding rectangular bilboard to the window or spot light http://blog.tenthamendmentcenter.com/files/2013/10/shining-a-light.jpg
also it would help when creating grass with billboards

data.title: Can the assetimporter export the model that apply the rotation as origin
data.body:
Hi,
Is there a way to rotate the mesh and clear its rotation info when I export it through assetimporter? 

The origin model in blender:
![origin](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2742295/270915e4-c701-11e3-9bf0-58d69e8e3e45.jpg)

The model in editor:
![editor](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2742315/6503e6a8-c701-11e3-9012-4fdf02917ffa.jpg)

I want that the model will as it is in the Editor, but the rotation are 0, will the assetimporter add this function? Or is there any way to do this? Reset the rotation to 0 will make the life easier.

Thank you.

data.title: Fixed joystick support
data.body:
Completed changes necessary to migrate from SDL1.2 API to SDL2 API.
- Removed reliance on SDL1.2 API functions.
- Added support for events SDL_JOYDEVICEADDED and SDL_JOYDEVICEREMOVED.
- Added Urho3D events E_JOYSTICKCONNECTEDand E_E_JOYSTICKDISCONNECTED.
- Added SDL_JoystickID as a JoystickState variable.
- All joysticks are open by default. All joystick events will receive the InstanceID of the joystick for application-level control.
- SDL_JoystickID is now used instead of the Joystick index. This way, the order that joysticks connect does not matter. If a joystick or controller gets disconnected, and then later reconnects during the same game session, it will retain the same SDL_JoystickID.

Note: Virtual (on-screen) joysticks should still work, but has not been tested.

I have tested a generic joystick (with hat) and an Xbox 360 controller, both working as expected.

data.title: Add additional SDL event handler
data.body:
Currently there is no hotplugging support for joysticks and game controllers in Urho3D. SDL supports both of these with the following events:
- SDL_JOYDEVICEADDED
- SDL_JOYDEVICEREMOVED

Game controllers also get the following available events:
- SDL_CONTROLLERDEVICEADDED
- SDL_CONTROLLERDEVICEREMOVED

Which shouldn't be necessary, but is worth mentioning.

It is also worth mentioning that [per the patch notes](https://wiki.libsdl.org/MigrationGuide#Joysticks), we should also be indexing the following:

```
SDL_JoystickID myID = SDL_JoystickInstanceID(myOpenedStick);
```

It would be nice to see these updated, but I am too involved in my own project to _properly_ update these.

data.title: add an option for exporting the scene meshes even if they are identical ...
data.body:
...with the others

When I export the scene info from unity3d editor,  the assetimporter optimized the identical meshes, and I don't know which mesh will be ignored by the importer when I export scene info from unity3d. To prevent  my exporter bug, I added this option.

data.title: Folders that autoload subfolders/paks on load
data.body: Autoload folders will load any subsequent folders/.pak files into the resource system automatically.

data.title: Adds package entry names to PackageFile
data.body:
If I can get a list of the filenames in a PackageFile I can add pak files to the resource browser and bring visibility of those items into the Editor.  This is my best effort at exposing something to the script api.

Thanks,
Chris

data.title: Deserializer::ReadString can't read whole text file
data.body:
Hi,
I use this function to read a text file, or an xml file, but it can't finished. It is dead loop. I digg into the source code and found that the function will break the loop only if the char is 0.
This function can't read a text file with whole content correct. Or is there other function for reading a whole text file?

data.title: material ccw and cw error
data.body:
Hi,
I found a strange issue that the model can't render correct, pictures below:

blender render ok:
![blender-ok](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2704559/62ca8f20-c46f-11e3-9709-db0042a86cfc.png)

blender cull CCW ok:
![blender-cull](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2704562/72a33e60-c46f-11e3-84f8-7df1b6e90b60.png)

unity render ok:
![unity-ok](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2704509/96cfc228-c46e-11e3-9ada-cbea10fef7f1.png)

In the Editor cull CCW rendered:
![error](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2704517/ad8bc160-c46e-11e3-83e8-c4e9f8d91292.png)

In the Editor cull CW rendered:
![cw](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7183905/2704537/ff2b87c6-c46e-11e3-8d11-8a8e6769d711.png)

They use the same material file. Would you tell me what is the problem occurs?
Thank you for your time!
